title: Oh, My Little Lambs

lines.raw: [G]Someday you may [F#7]fall, over[Bm]come by your des[A7]pair. [D]

tokens.lyric: soul, no one will come to

lines.raw: [G]Weak, wounded [D]soul, no one will come to [A]comfort you;
[Bm]Alone, you have [A]no one to [D]love you, [G]no one to [D]bring the [Bm]truth. [Em] [A7] [D]

tokens.lyric: O, my little lambs, here is the One who heals your sins.

lines.raw: O, my little lambs, here is the One who heals your sins.

tokens.lyric: O, see how He carries the cross and leads the way.

lines.raw: O, see how He carries the cross and leads the way.

tokens.lyric: Come, follow Him, He is the shepherd you have sought.

lines.raw: Come, follow Him, He is the shepherd you have sought.

tokens.lyric: Without Him you tremble in weakness, far from the path of life.

lines.raw: Without Him you tremble in weakness, far from the path of life.

tokens.lyric: O, my little lambs, hunger and thirst may torture you,

lines.raw: O, my little lambs, hunger and thirst may torture you,

tokens.lyric: Receive Him completely with all that you have.

lines.raw: Receive Him completely with all that you have.

tokens.lyric: You shall be healed, Heavenly strength will fill your soul,

lines.raw: You shall be healed, Heavenly strength will fill your soul,

tokens.lyric: And deep boundless joy will swell within you eternally.

lines.raw: And deep boundless joy will swell within you eternally.

tokens.lyric: O, my little lambs, now is the time for joyful heart,

lines.raw: O, my little lambs, now is the time for joyful heart,

tokens.lyric: Sing praise to the Lord; raise your voices in strength.

lines.raw: Sing praise to the Lord; raise your voices in strength.

tokens.lyric: Love all mankind, Love everyone throughout the world.

lines.raw: Love all mankind, Love everyone throughout the world.

tokens.lyric: O give them the love that I give you, O my little lambs.

lines.raw: O give them the love that I give you, O my little lambs.
